title: Drawing, "Sideboard", September 30, 1933
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower left: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right: SCALE 1"-1'0"/7487 [circled]; lower right in red color pencil: P; lower left in graphite: K/9/30/33
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for sideboard. Long, horizontal body in either wood or lacquer; reflective top probably Bakelite. Rounded support on body of sideboard in darker material, two straight plank legs. Two stacked drawers on left and right side of sideboard with rectangular pull on each drawer near outer surface; two false pulls at center.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sideboard", September 30, 1933.
September 30, 1933. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-910.
